section.p: The discovery of a rat’s skeleton at the bottom of a used beer barrel provokes discontent among the crew. Matters are worsened by the first mate’s jocular remark that the rat will have given the beer some flavour. The men become surly.

At seven bells in the forenoon watch, you come on deck to discover the men on duty have broken a keg of black Barony wine out of ship’s stores and are blind drunk. The ship has been drifting untended for hours!
